name: Limacine Liquefaction
description:
Here's a game based on these Mo'Vocab animations - check them out here.

A game by yours truly starring the little red idiot, his treadmill farm and his unconventional means of pest control. Run over the treadmills to build up speed before you're surrounded by sluggage and grab the tractor and take your revenge on as many limacine lifeforms as you can! Hey wow you can also tweet your score at the end.
